Race.SpecificTitle: Town of Mangham -- 1% S&U Renewal- M&BOA - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Town of Mangham Proposition
(Renewal of Sales Tax)
Race.FullText: Shall the Town of Mangham of the Parish of Richland, State of Louisiana (the "Town"), levy a one percent (1%) sales and use tax (an estimated $105,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year) in the District for a period of ten (10) years, beginning January 1, 2017 and ending December 31, 2026 for any lawful purpose?
